titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: We left Eton after breakfast, & returned to Hereford via London, arriving about 3. 30p.m. I found a pile of letters, including a long & affectionate one from George. I wrote cheques for divers quarterly charges, & wrote to Dicey about the Enabling Bill.
